issue.title: [C++] Add TeeNode to execution engine
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16426](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16426). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The existing write node is a consuming one while the proposed tee node is a pass-through one.

comments.body:
